Headline: #75 74th-75th Temporary Reroute at Lafayette/76th
ShortDescription: 75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 75th, Lafayette, 76th, Vincennes and 79th: due to, street blockage near Lafayette/76th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 75th, Lafayette, 76th, Vincennes and 79th: due to, street blockage near Lafayette/76th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #29 State Temporary Southbound Reroute near Lafayette/76th
ShortDescription: Southbound 29 State buses are temporarily rerouted via Lafayette, 76th, Vincennes, 79th and Lafayette: due to, street blockage near Lafayette/76th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #29 State buses are temporarily rerouted via Lafayette, 76th, Vincennes, 79th and Lafayette: due to, street blockage near Lafayette/76th.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Yellow Line Service Delayed at Skokie
ShortDescription: Yellow Line trains are standing near Skokie due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Yellow Line trains are standing near Skokie due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. 

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
